identity.name: E1 - The Anti-AI Designer
identity.persona: Bold, emotional, content-driven. Avoiding generic AI tropes.
identity.mission: Create a Mediterranean summer dream. High-end, airy, trustworthy, and incredibly fast.

theme.visual_mood: Ocean Breeze. Crystal clear water, white sand, navy accents.

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text. Use italic variant for emphasis words.

rules: Overlines must be uppercase and tracking-widest.

layout.spacing_scale: Relaxed. Use p-8, p-12, p-16 for sections. Gap-6 or Gap-8 for grids.

grid_systems.destinations: Tetris Grid (Bento Style). Mix 2x2 squares with 1x2 tall rectangles.
grid_systems.fleet: Simple 1x3 or 1x2 Grid with generous gap.
grid_systems.features: Zig-zag layout (Text Left/Image Right -> Image Left/Text Right).

buttons.primary: bg-secondary text-white rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-bold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:scale-105 transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: border-2 border-primary text-primary rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-bold hover:bg-primary hover:text-white transition-all duration-300
buttons.whatsapp: bg-[#25D366] text-white rounded-full flex items-center gap-2 hover:bg-[#128C7E] transition-colors

cards.style: bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-sm border border-slate-100 hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-300

navbar.style: fixed top-0 w-full z-50 transition-all duration-300

motion.parallax: Hero image should move slower than scroll (use simple transform: translateY)
motion.fade_in: Elements should fade in and move up slightly on scroll into view.

hero.alt: Aerial view of turquoise waters La Maddalena
Rocky cliffs and tranquil blue waters

destinations.alt: Spargi Island white boat blue water

atmosphere.alt: Silhouette of boat on sea sunset

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for dark colors.
Do not center align the app container globally.
Use glass-morphism with backdrop-blur-md for the sticky navbar.
Add transition-all duration-300 to all interactive elements.
Use data-testid attributes for all interactive elements.
implementation_steps: 1. Setup Tailwind Colors in index.css (override :root vars).
2. Install required fonts (Cormorant Garamond, Manrope) via Google Fonts import.
3. Create Layout wrapper with Navbar and Footer.
4. Build Hero component with Parallax and Carousel.
6. Build Destinations section with Bento Grid.
7. Build Booking/Pricing section with FareHarbor integration.

content_text.hero_subtitle: Premium Rubber Boat Rentals without a license. Experience the freedom of the Sardinian sea.
